name: Chore Chart Notion Template
description: Chore Chart & Household Task ManagerGet ready for a more organized, efficient, and happier household.This fully customizable Chore Chart Notion Template is a simple and effective solution to help you or your family stay on top of household chores. Loaded with pre-filled tasks that can be tailored to your specific needs, this template will become your favorite way to stay organized. Gain back valuable time and use this template to:Keep your home clean and organized.Assign chore frequency (dai
features: Keep your home clean and organized.; Assign chore frequency (daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, etc.).; See overdue chores and tasks.; Label top priority tasks.; Sort chores by area (entire house, bedrooms, bathrooms, kitchen, etc.).; Delegate chores and responsibilities.; Chore Chart Database - pre-filled with 45 common household tasks and chores; Chore Calendar - see all upcoming household tasks in a calendar view; Multiple Pre-Set Views - frequency, top priority, all overdue, overdue by area; Mobile-Friendly (though best on a computer, this template is mobile-friendly)
